name: ShivMantra
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shiv mantra
des:
SHIV MANTRA MEDITATION to Remove Negative Energy with Very Powerful Shiv Tandav Beats.

One of the ancient vedic mantras , OM Namah Shivaya is an Adoration to Lord Śhiva, preceded by the mystical syllable OM or Aum. It is also known as Shiva Mantra, and is said to be a mantra of Transformation. Chanting this mantra helps to in overcoming internal limitations and negativity and leads us to the path of higher consciousness. Hope this will help you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
